title: Administrative Assistant/ Scheduler/ Caller/ Social Media Manager
job_overview:
Job Title: Administrative Assistant for Real Estate Company

Location: Remote Job Type: Full-Time

About Us: We are a dynamic real estate company dedicated to providing exceptional service to our clients. We are seeking a highly organized and proactive Administrative Assistant to join our team and support our operations.

Responsibilities:

Perform administrative tasks, including managing schedules, preparing documents, and organizing files.

Call leads and maintain effective communication with clients.

Manage and grow our social media presence across various platforms.

Create engaging content and campaigns to enhance brand visibility.

Utilize Microsoft Word and Excel for documentation and reporting.

Collaborate with the team to ensure smooth day-to-day operations.

Ensure proficiency in DocuSign for electronic document handling and transactions.

Effectively utilize CRM systems to manage customer relationships and leads.

Requirements:

Proven experience in social media management and content creation.

Proficiency in Microsoft Word, Excel, DocuSign, and CRM systems.

Strong organizational skills and attention to detail.

Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal.

Ability to multitask and work independently.

Previous experience in administrative roles is a plus.

Application Process: To apply, please submit the following:

Your resume.

A DISC assessment report.

Examples of previous social media projects.

A video introduction highlighting your skills and experience.

How to Apply: Send your application to Upgrade to see actual info with the subject line "Administrative Assistant Application - [Your Name]."
